Reviews.Content: Clayderman will drive you nuts Reasonable rooms in an acceptable area. Typically hard Chinese bed. No complimentary water and no one knows what ice cubes are. No currency exchange on Sunday - had to use a nearby ATM. One of Clayderman's songs gets played in the reception and dining room over, and over again.
Reviews.Author: RoamingNut
